registerAs.title: Register as
registerAs.comment: If you are looking for housing, sign up as a student. If you have a room for rent, then sign up as a host.

form.other: Did you mean to register as a host?

personalDetails.title: Personal details
personalDetails.comment: Your name will be shown publicly, other personal information will be for registration and matching purposes only.

searchCriteria.title: My search criteria
searchCriteria.comment: Let us know what type of search criteria you have so that we can help you find the best match.

aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.comment: This information helps us to improve the chance for a succesfull match.

experience.title: Past experience
experience.itemCheckbox: Lived with a host,Lived abroad,Lived on my own,None of the above

aboutYourself.title: Short description about yourself
aboutYourself.placeholder: This description will be visible for hosts and guest families. To increase your chance of success write something about who you are, what you like to do in your free time and what you are going to do in the Netherlands. And it is always good to share your favourite dish!

socialPreferences.title: Social preferences
socialPreferences.comment: Not everyone is the same. Some wish for more privacy and others are looking for the full experience. An indication helps to find the right match.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.items: As much privacy as possible,Let’s share a house and new experiences!

newInTown.title: New in town
newInTown.items: I manage myself,I’d prefer a host who helps me get around

profilePicture.title: Profile picture
profilePicture.comment: This picture will be visible for hosts and guest families, so make sure to use a recent photo.

photo.title: Please select an image of yourself

deleteAccount.title: Delete account
deleteAccount.text1: Warning, when you delete your account you will lose:
deleteAccount.items: - all your data,- all you conversations with hosts,- all your rooms
deleteAccount.text2: If you have any questions regarding Hospi Housing please contact us, we’re happy to help!
